wikipedia_page.main: Captain John Jordan Lloyd Williams  (born 1894; date of death unknown) was a British World War I flying ace credited with five aerial victories. He served in the Royal Air Force until the mid-1930s, and was later appointed Chief Constable of Cardiganshire.
